9
10#include <sys/types.h>
11#include <openssl/des.h>
12#include <openssl/rand.h>
13
14int DES_random_key(DES_cblock *ret)
15{
16 do {
17 if (RAND_priv_bytes((unsigned char *)ret, sizeof(DES_cblock)) != 1)
18 return 0;
19 } while (DES_is_weak_key(ret));
20 DES_set_odd_parity(ret);
21 return 1;
22}
23
